name: waypoint
description: Easily generate dynamic content maps in your folder notes. Enables folders to show up in the graph view and removes the need for messy tags!

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp cp main.js manifest.json  '/Users/zhaihao/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/ORISON/.obsidian/plugins/waypoint'
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
